data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cerretti, Pierfilippo, Pape, Thomas (2007): Two new species of European Stevenia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera: Rhinophoridae) and a key to the Palaearctic species. Zootaxa 1624: 31-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273944
